#section-header h3: Compact and pleasant GUI for translators!
#section-about p:nth-of-type(1): pyTranslate is a simple, ultra-compact application that helps you translate words and phrases.
#section-about div:nth-of-type(2) p:
__html__
  • The app can always stay on top!
  • It can save search history
  • Full compatibility with translators
#section-download p: You can download one of the versions available below or visit GitHub to build the app yourself.
